data.name: Shiori Ueda
data.description: I am a photographer based in Tokyo. I started photography as a hobby in 2018 and quickly became passionate about it. I have been working as a cameraman for a [web media]('https://bigakusei.com/cameraman/ueda-shiori/') since 2020. I am deeply fascinated by capturing the beauty of natural light, which has the power to transform ordinary scenes into extraordinary ones! The purpose of this website is to showcase a digital collection of my favorite works. I hope you enjoy my photographs.
data.contact: Please contact me via [Instagram]('https://www.instagram.com/sh_photo27') DM for any inquiries.
